Subject: An immensely obese middle-aged man with a round, cheerful face, double chin, and rosy cheeks.
Wearing a tight, neon-colored professional cyclist jersey that is stretching at the seams and tiny spandex shorts.
He has short curly hair, wide excited eyes, and massive calves.
He is wearing professional cycling sunglasses and a helmet that looks too small for his head.
Action: He is competitively racing on an incredibly tiny, pink tricycle meant for a toddler.
His knees are flared out wide to accommodate his stomach, elbows bent sharply.
He is leaning forward with intense determination, tongue sticking out slightly in concentration.
The tricycle tires are flattened under the weight, sparking against the asphalt.
Scene: A professional Tour de France style race track with blurred spectators cheering in the background.
Bright sunny daylight with high contrast shadows.
Asphalt road texture clearly visible.
Motion blur on the background to emphasize speed despite the ridiculous vehicle.
scenario1.Style: Hyper-realistic photography, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, wide angle lens, 9:16 vertical aspect ratio
scenario1.Technical(Negative Prompt): No hallucinations, no distortion of tricycle wheels beyond weight compression, no bad anatomy.

Subject: A colossal, heavyset man with a thick beard and a gruff expression.
Dressed in a delicate, frilly pink ballerina tutu and white tights that are ripping slightly.
He is hairy and muscular underneath the fat, creating a jarring contrast with the delicate clothing.
He is wearing satin ballet slippers that look like they are about to explode.
Action: He is attempting a graceful mid-air 'grand jet√©' leap.
His face shows a mix of serene artistic focus and sheer physical strain.
Sweat droplets are flying off his forehead.
Gravity is visibly pulling on his skin and belly as he hangs in the air.
One leg is extended, but the other is struggling to lift.
Scene: A grand, ornate opera house stage with velvet red curtains and gold trim.
A spotlight hits him directly from above, creating a halo effect.
Dust motes dancing in the stage light.
The wooden floorboards beneath where he launched are cracked and splintered.
scenario2.Style: Dramatic theatrical photography, high dynamic range, crisp details, 9:16 vertical aspect ratio
scenario2.Technical(Negative Prompt): No missing limbs, no extra fingers, no blurry face, no disfigured background.

Subject: A gargantuan tourist with sunburnt skin and a zinc-covered nose.
Wearing a tropical Hawaiian shirt unbuttoned to reveal a massive belly and khaki cargo shorts.
He has a floppy sun hat and a camera strapped around his neck.
His expression is one of pure terror and regret.
Action: He is bungee jumping off a bridge, but the bungee cord has stretched into a thread-thin line.
He is hovering just inches above the water surface, face-to-face with a surprised alligator.
His arms are flailing upwards, and his cheeks are flapping in the wind from the descent.
The cord is visibly strained to the breaking point.
Scene: A deep canyon with a rushing river below.
Cliffs rising on both sides with sparse vegetation.
Bright, harsh noon sunlight reflecting off the water.
Water splashes rising up towards him.
scenario3.Style: GoPro action shot perspective, vibrant colors, sharp focus, 9:16 vertical aspect ratio
scenario3.Technical(Negative Prompt): No physics defiance regarding the rope attachment, no cartoonish rendering, no text overlays.

Subject: A morbidly obese man in a full tactical SWAT team uniform.
The bulletproof vest looks like a bib on his chest.
He is wearing combat boots and knee pads.
He has a serious, intense 'action movie' facial expression with a headset microphone.
Action: He is attempting to rappel down a wall specifically 'Mission Impossible' style.
However, he is stuck halfway, dangling horizontally.
The rope is cutting into the building architecture, crumbling the stone edge.
He is reaching for a donut that is resting on a window ledge just out of reach.
Scene: The side of a modern glass skyscraper.
Reflections of the city skyline in the glass windows.
Dramatic sunset lighting creating orange and blue hues.
Inside the window next to him, office workers are staring in confusion.
scenario4.Style: Blockbuster movie poster aesthetic, intense color grading, high contrast, 9:16 vertical aspect ratio
scenario4.Technical(Negative Prompt): No impossible rope physics, no morphing of glass, no low resolution textures.

Subject: An incredibly large man with a friendly, Santa-like face but no beard.
Wearing classic 1980s aerobics gear: striped headband, teal leotard, and pink leg warmers.
He is sweating profusely, with wet hair matted to his forehead.
He has a look of absolute determination and joy.
Action: He is on a trampoline, caught at the very bottom of the bounce.
The trampoline mat is stretched all the way down to touch the grass underneath.
The metal springs are flying off in all directions due to the tension.
His body is compressed into a ball shape from the G-force.
Scene: A suburban backyard with a neatly trimmed green lawn.
A white picket fence and a blue sky with fluffy white clouds.
A golden retriever dog in the background looking barking at the chaos.
Bright, cheerful, commercial-style lighting.
scenario5.Style: Commercial photography, freeze-frame action, ultra-detailed, 9:16 vertical aspect ratio
scenario5.Technical(Negative Prompt): No motion blur on the main subject, no distorted face, no missing springs.
